Input.Autocomplete.description: Allows a user to input text with autocomplete option.

id.description: Unique identifier for the value. Used to identify collected input when the Submit action is performed.

value.description: Initial value that should be selected.

placeholder.description: Description of the input desired. Only visible when no selection has been made.

dataSource.description: DataSource is an abstraction for using local data (arrays of JavaScript objects) or remote data (web services returning JSON or XML).
